Description: You let loose a flare of electricity in a 20 foot circle, centered on you, striking all creatures around you. Creatures in the area must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC. On a fail, a creature takes electric damage. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is paralyzed.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
